meanings.definition: Derived or transferred from the same individual's body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the autologous blood transfusion would be the safest option for the patient.
meanings.sent2: She opted for an autologous skin graft to avoid any risk of rejection.
meanings.sent3: The autologous organ donation made the surgeon's job much easier.
meanings.sent4: Her autologous stem cells were like little superheroes fighting off the illness.
meanings.sent5: The concept of autologous treatment seemed like a personalized gift from one's own body.

meanings.definition: Relating to a tissue or organ transplanted from one part of the body to another in the same individual.
meanings.sent1: The autologous kidney transplant was successful, and the patient recovered well.
meanings.sent2: He underwent autologous bone marrow transplantation to treat his condition.
meanings.sent3: The autologous heart relocation was a strange but effective medical procedure.
meanings.sent4: Her autologous liver seemed to adapt seamlessly to its new location.
meanings.sent5: The idea of an autologous organ moving around the body was both fascinating and surreal.
